pickOne: **Chaotic** - Free someone from literal or figurative bonds.
**Good** - Endanger yourself to combat an unnatural threat.
**Neutral** - Help an animal or spirit of the wild.

title: Race
pickOne: Elf - When you **Undertake A Perilous Journey** through wilderness whatever job you take you suceed as if you rolled a 10+.
Human - When you **Make Camp** in a dungeon or city, you don't need to consume a ration.

outcomes.text: This move does nothing and is a placeholder for future development.
